name: Shape Cascade (itch)
description:
Falling shapes drop from above, can you push them into the right place? Test your skills and fast reflexes in Shape Cascade! Is it better to leave one shape to catch the wondrous bonus star? Or maybe you'd like to squash that annoying laughman... It's up to YOU!

  • 15 different levels to play
  • Each shape has its own physics!
  • Random power-ups will drop down to help you! catch them all!
  • Unlock many different cursors to push the shapes better!
